question: 伸ばす
sourceAnswer: to{} grow-long-(e.g.-hair,-nails) | lengthen/extend/stretch | reach-out/hold-out | straighten/smooth-out | spread-evenly-(dough,-cream,-etc.) | dilute/thin-out | postpone | prolong | strengthen/develop/expand
userAnswer: to{} stretch/lengthen | extend | grow-long | reach-out | straighten/smooth-out | spread-evenly
activeAnswer: to{} stretch/lengthen | extend | grow-long | reach-out | straighten/smooth-out | spread-evenly
sourceMnemonic: If <ja>伸びる</ja> is "to be stretched" then <ja>伸ばす</ja> is <vocabulary>to stretch something</vocabulary>, where you're doing the stretching. You know this because you took a <reading>bus</reading> and you stretched it out to be an even longer bus.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading comes from <ja>伸びる</ja>, so if you know that you should know this.
